abstract: Man in the News profile of Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz, veteran interior minister of Saudi Arabia, who is expected to be elevated to crown prince.
snippet: Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz, a veteran Saudi interior minister, is expected to be elevated to heir to the crown this week after the death of Prince Sultan.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Prince Nayef bin Abdul Aziz, a veteran Saudi interior minister, is expected to be elevated to heir to the crown this week after the death of Prince Sultan.

headline.main: Potential New Saudi Crown Prince Seen as Hard-Line but Pragmatic
headline.print_headline: Potential New Saudi Crown Prince Seen as Hard-Line but Pragmatic
headline.seo: Potential New Saudi Crown Prince Is Hard-Line but Pragmatic
headline.content_kicker: Man in the News: Prince Nayef Bin Abdul Aziz
